mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.admin_name as adminName ,a.admin_phone as adminPhone ,a.admin_id_number as adminIdNumber ,a.admin_photo as adminPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.admin_email as adminEmail ,a.admin_address as adminAddress ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM admin a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.admin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.adminName},'%')
and a.admin_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.adminPhone},'%')
and a.admin_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.adminIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.admin_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.adminEmail},'%')
and a.admin_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.adminAddress},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
